GK16dkavy12u:2: manase ramatāṃ nityaṃ sarvaśuklā sarasvatī // DKd_1.1 //
GK16dkavy12u:6: vācām eva prasādena lokayātrā pravartate // DKd_1.3 //
GK16dkavy12u:8: yadi śabdāhavayaṃ jyotir āsaṃsārān na dīpyate // DKd_1.4 //
GK16dkavy12u:10: teṣām asaṃnidhāne 'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati // DKd_1.5 //
GK16dkavy12u:11: gaur gauḥ kāmadughā samyak prayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:12: duṣprayuktā punār gotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati // DKd_1.6 //
GK16dkavy12u:13: tad alpam api nopekṣyaṃ kāvye duṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana &
GK16dkavy12u:14: syād vapuḥ sundaram api śvitreṇaikena durbhagam // DKd_1.7 //
GK16dkavy12u:20: taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānām alaṃkārāś ca darśitāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:22: padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca tat tridhaiva vyavasthitam &
GK16dkavy12u:23: padyaṃ catuṣpadī tac ca vṛttaṃ jātir iti dvidhā // DKd_1.11 //
GK16dkavy12u:25: sā vidyā naur vivikṣūṇāṃ gambhīraṃ kāvyasāgaram // DKd_1.12 //
GK16dkavy12u:26: muktakaṃ kulakaṃ koṣaḥ saṃghāta iti tādṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:39: kāvyaṃ kalpāntarasthāyi jāyate sad alaṃkṛti // DKd_1.19 //
GK16dkavy12u:40: nyūnam apy atra yaiḥ kaiś cid aṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati &
GK16dkavy12u:41: yady upātteṣu saṃpattir ārādhayati tadvidhaḥ // DKd_1.20 //
GK16dkavy12u:42: guṇataḥ prāg upanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām &
GK16dkavy12u:43: nirākaraṇam ity eṣa mārgaḥ prakṛtisundaraḥ // DKd_1.21 //
GK16dkavy12u:45: tajjayān nāyakotkarṣakathanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ // DKd_1.22 //
GK16dkavy12u:47: iti tasya prabhedau dvau tayor ākhyāyikā kila // DKd_1.23 //
GK16dkavy12u:50: api tv aniyamo dṛṣṭas tatrāpy anyair udīraṇāt &
GK16dkavy12u:51: anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti kīdṛg vā bhedakāraṇam (vl. lakṣaṇam) // DKd_1.25 //
GK16dkavy12u:52: vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca socchvāsatvaṃ ca bhedakam &
GK16dkavy12u:53: cihnam ākhyāyikāyāś cet prasaṅgena kathāsv api // DKd_1.26 //
GK16dkavy12u:55: bhedaś ca dṛṣṭo lambhādir ucchvāso vastu kiṃ tataḥ // DKd_1.27 //
GK16dkavy12u:59: sargabandhasamā eva naite vaiśeṣikā guṇāḥ // DKd_1.29 //
GK16dkavy12u:61: mukham iṣṭāsrthasaṃsiddhau kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām // DKd_1.30 //
GK16dkavy12u:63: gadyapadyamayī kā cic campūr ity abhidhīyate // DKd_1.31 //
GK16dkavy12u:64: tad etad vāṅmayaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā &
GK16dkavy12u:65: apabhraṃśāś ca miśraṃ cety āhur āryāś caturvidhaṃ // DKd_1.32 //
GK16dkavy12u:66: saṃskṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāg anvākhyātā maharṣibhiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:67: tadbhavas tatsamo deśīty anekaḥ prākṛtakramaḥ // DKd_1.33 //
GK16dkavy12u:70: śaurasenī ca gauḍī ca lāṭī cānyā ca tādṛśī &
GK16dkavy12u:71: yāti prākṛtam ity evaṃ vyavahāreṣu saṃnidhim // DKd_1.35 //
GK16dkavy12u:75: osarādir apabhraṃśo nāṭakādi tu miśrakam // DKd_1.37 //
GK16dkavy12u:76: kathā hi sarvabhāṣābhiḥ saṃskṛtena ca badhyate &
GK16dkavy12u:79: śravyam eveti saiṣāpi dvayī gatir udāhṛtā // DKd_1.39 //
GK16dkavy12u:80: asty aneko girāṃ mārgaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparam &
GK16dkavy12u:84: iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:85: eṣāṃ viparyayaḥ prāyo dṛśyate gauḍavartmani // DKd_1.42 //
GK16dkavy12u:91: lakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanotīti pratītisubhagaṃ vacaḥ // DKd_1.45 //
GK16dkavy12u:102: madhuraṃ rasavad vāci vastuny api rasasthitiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:103: yena mādyanti dhīmanto madhuneva madhuvratāḥ // DKd_1.51 //
GK16dkavy12u:104: yayā kayā cic chrutyā yat samānam anubhūyate &
GK16dkavy12u:105: tadrūpā hi padāsattiḥ sānuprāsā rasāvahā // DKd_1.52 //
GK16dkavy12u:106: eṣa rājā yadā lakṣmīṃ prāptavān brāhmaṇapriyaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:107: tadā prabhṛti dharmasya loke 'sminn utsavo 'bhavat // DKd_1.53 //
GK16dkavy12u:108: itīdaṃ nādṛtaṃ gauḍair anuprāsas tu tatpriyaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:109: anuprāsād api prāyo vaidarbhair idam īpsitam // DKd_1.54 //
GK16dkavy12u:110: varṇāvṛttir anuprāsaḥ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca &
GK16dkavy12u:113: indranīlanibhaṃ lakṣma saṃdadhāty alinaḥ śriyam // DKd_1.56 //
GK16dkavy12u:114: cāru cāndramasaṃ bhīru bimbaṃ paśyaitad ambare &
GK16dkavy12u:115: manmano manmathākrāntaṃ nirdayaṃ hantum udyataṃ // DKd_1.57 //
GK16dkavy12u:117: na tu rāmāmukhāmbhojasadṛśaś candramā iti // DKd_1.58 //
GK16dkavy12u:118: smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopaś ca naḥ kṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:119: cyuto mānodhiko rāgo moho jātosavo gatāḥ // DKd_1.59 //
GK16dkavy12u:121: ato naivam anuprāsaṃ dākṣiṇātyāḥ prayuñjate // DKd_1.60 //
GK16dkavy12u:123: tat tu naikāntamadhuramataḥ paścād vidhāsyate // DKd_1.61 //
GK16dkavy12u:124: kāmaṃ sarvo 'py alaṃkāro rasam arthe niṣiñcati &
GK16dkavy12u:125: tathāpy agrāmyataivainaṃ bhāraṃ vahati bhūyasā // DKd_1.62 //
GK16dkavy12u:126: kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ na tvaṃ kāmayase katham &
GK16dkavy12u:127: iti grāmyo 'yam arthātmā vairasyāya prakalpate // DKd_1.63 //
GK16dkavy12u:129: tvayi nirmatsaro diṣṭyety agrāmo 'rtho rasāvahaḥ // DKd_1.64 //
GK16dkavy12u:133: duṣpratītikaraṃ grāmyaṃ yathā yā bhavataḥ priyā // DKd_1.66 //
GK16dkavy12u:134: kharaṃ prahatya viśrāntaḥ puruṣo vīryavān iti &
GK16dkavy12u:135: evamādi na śaṃsanti mārgayor ubhayor api // DKd_1.67 //
GK16dkavy12u:137: vibhaktam iti mādhuryam ucyate sukumāratā // DKd_1.68 //
GK16dkavy12u:144: dīptam ity aparair bhūmnā kṛcchrodyam api badhyate &
GK16dkavy12u:145: nyakṣeṇa kṣapitaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇād iti // DKd_1.72 //
GK16dkavy12u:149: itīyaty eva nirdiṣṭe neyatvam uragāsṛjaḥ // DKd_1.74 //
GK16dkavy12u:150: nedṛśaṃ bahu manyatne mārgayor ubhayor api &
GK16dkavy12u:151: na hi pratītiḥ subhagā śabdanyāyavilaṅghinī // DKd_1.75 //
GK16dkavy12u:152: utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaś cid yasminn ukte pratīyate &
GK16dkavy12u:154: arthiṇāṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt &
GK16dkavy12u:155: tadavasthā punar deva nānyasya mukham īkṣate // DKd_1.77 //
GK16dkavy12u:156: iti tyāgasya vākye 'sminn utkarṣaḥ sādhu lakṣyate &
GK16dkavy12u:157: anenaiva pathānyac ca samānanyāyam ūhyatām // DKd_1.78 //
GK16dkavy12u:158: ślāghyair viśeṣaṇair yuktam udāraṃ kaiś cid iṣyate &
GK16dkavy12u:161: padye 'py adakṣiṇātyānām idam ekaṃ parāyaṇam // DKd_1.80 //
GK16dkavy12u:167: anye tv anākulaṃ hṛdyam icchanty ojo girāṃ yathā // DKd_1.83 //
GK16dkavy12u:169: kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati // DKd_1.84 //
GK16dkavy12u:171: tac ca vārtābhidhāneṣu varṇanāsv api dṛśyate // DKd_1.85 //
GK16dkavy12u:172: gṛhāṇi nāma tāny eva taporāśir bhavādṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:173: saṃbhāvayati yāny eva pāvanaiḥ pādapāṃsubhiḥ // DKd_1.86 //
GK16dkavy12u:175: avakāśo na paryāptas tava bāhulatāntare // DKd_1.87 //
GK16dkavy12u:179: yo 'rthas tenātituṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ // DKd_1.89 //
GK16dkavy12u:183: idam evaṃvidhiṃ bhāvi bhavatyāḥ stanajṛmbhaṇam // DKd_1.91 //
GK16dkavy12u:184: idam atyuktir ity uktam etad gauḍopalālitam &
GK16dkavy12u:185: prasthānaṃ prākpraṇītaṃ tu sāram anyasya vartmanaḥ // DKd_1.92 //
GK16dkavy12u:187: samyag ādhīyate yatra sa samādhiḥ smṛto yathā // DKd_1.93 //
GK16dkavy12u:189: iti netrakriyādhyāsāl labdhā tadvācinī śrutiḥ // DKd_1.94 //
GK16dkavy12u:194: iti hṛdamahṛdyaṃ tu niṣṭhīvati vadhūr iti &
GK16dkavy12u:195: yugapan naikadharmāṇām adhyāsaś ca smṛto yathā // DKd_1.97 //
GK16dkavy12u:199: itīme garbhiṇīdharmā bahavo 'py atra darśitāḥ // DKd_1.99 //
GK16dkavy12u:200: tad etat kāvyasarvasvaṃ samādhir nāma yo guṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:201: kavisārthaḥ samagro 'pi tam enam anugacchati // DKd_1.100 //
GK16dkavy12u:203: tadbhedās tu na śakyante vaktuṃ pratikavisthitāḥ // DKd_1.101 //
GK16dkavy12u:205: tathāpi na tad ākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate // DKd_1.102 //
GK16dkavy12u:206: naisargikī ca pratibhā śrutaṃ ca bahunirmalam &
GK16dkavy12u:208: na vidyate yady api pūrvavāsanāguṇānubandhi pratibhānam adbhutam &
GK16dkavy12u:209: śrutena yatnena ca vāgupāsitā dhruvaṃ karoty eva kam apy anugraham // DKd_1.104 //
GK16dkavy12u:210: tadastatandrair aniśaṃ sarasvatī śramād upāsyā khalu kīrtim īpsubhiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:211: kṛśe kavitve 'pi janāḥ kṛtaśramā vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartum īśate // DKd_1.105 //
GK16dkavy12u:212: ity ācāryadaṇḍinaḥ kṛtau kāvyādarśe mārgavibhāgo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16dkavy12u:214: te cādyāpi vikalpyante kas tān kārtsnyena vakṣyati // DKd_2.1 //
GK16dkavy12u:215: kiṃ tu bījaṃ vikalpānāṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pradarśitam &
GK16dkavy12u:216: tad eva parisaṃskartum ayam asmatpariśramaḥ // DKd_2.2 //
GK16dkavy12u:217: kāś cin mārgavibhāgārtham uktāḥ prāg apy alaṃkriyāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:222: preyo rasavad ūrjasvi paryāyoktaṃ samāhitam // DKd_2.5 //
GK16dkavy12u:226: iti vācām alaṃkārā darśitāḥ pūrvasūribhiḥ // DKd_2.7 //
GK16dkavy12u:228: svabhāvoktiś ca jātiś cetyādyā sālaṃkṛtir yathā // DKd_2.8 //
GK16dkavy12u:230: trivarṇarājibhiḥ kaṇṭhair ete mañjugiraḥ śukāḥ // DKd_2.9 //
GK16dkavy12u:232: pārāvataḥ paribhramya riraṃsuś cumbati priyām // DKd_2.10 //
GK16dkavy12u:233: badhnann aṅgeṣu romāñcaṃ kurvan manasi nirvṛtim &
GK16dkavy12u:234: netre cāmīlayann eṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate // DKd_2.11 //
GK16dkavy12u:236: jaṭābhiḥ snigdhatāmrābhir āvir āsīd vṛṣadhvajaḥ // DKd_2.12 //
GK16dkavy12u:238: śāstreṣv asyaiva sāmrājyaṃ kāvyeṣv apy etad īpsitam // DKd_2.13 //
GK16dkavy12u:240: upamā nāma tasyāḥ prapañcodayaṃ pradarśyate // DKd_2.14 //
GK16dkavy12u:243: rājīvam iva te vaktraṃ netre nīlotpale iva &
GK16dkavy12u:247: tavānanam ivāmbhojam ambhojam iva te mukham &
GK16dkavy12u:249: tvanmukhaṃ kamalenaiva tulyaṃ nānyena kena cit &
GK16dkavy12u:250: ity anyasāmyavyāvṛtter iyaṃ sā niyamopamā // DKd_2.19 //
GK16dkavy12u:251: padmaṃ tāvat tavānveti mukham anyac ca tādṛśam &
GK16dkavy12u:252: asti ced astu tatkārīty asāv aniyamopamā // DKd_2.20 //
GK16dkavy12u:253: samuccayopamāpy asti na kāntyaiva mukhaṃ tava &
GK16dkavy12u:255: tvayy eva tvanmukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate divi candramāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:256: iyaty eva bhidā nānyety asāv atiśayopamā // DKd_2.22 //
GK16dkavy12u:257: mayy evāsyā mukahśrīr ity alam indor vikatthanaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:258: padme 'pi sā yad asty evety asāv utprekṣitopamā // DKd_2.23 //
GK16dkavy12u:259: yadi kiṃ cid bhavet padmaṃ subhru vibhrāntalocanam &
GK16dkavy12u:260: tat te mukhaśriyaṃ dhattām ity asāv adbhutopamā // DKd_2.24 //
GK16dkavy12u:262: indum apy anudhāvāmīty eṣā mohopamā smṛtā // DKd_2.25 //
GK16dkavy12u:263: kiṃ padmam antarbhrāntāli kiṃ te lolekṣaṇaṃ mukham &
GK16dkavy12u:264: mama dolāyate cittam itīyaṃ saṃśayopamā // DKd_2.26 //
GK16dkavy12u:266: atas tvanmukham evedam ity asau nirṇayopamā // DKd_2.27 //
GK16dkavy12u:268: ambhojam iva te vaktram iti śleṣopamā smṛtā // DKd_2.28 //
GK16dkavy12u:271: padmaṃ bahurajaś candraḥ kṣayī tābhyāṃ tavānanam &
GK16dkavy12u:272: samānam api sotsekam iti nindopamā smṛtā // DKd_2.30 //
GK16dkavy12u:274: tau tulyau tvanmukheneti sā praśaṃsopamocyate // DKd_2.31 //
GK16dkavy12u:275: candreṇa tvanmukhaṃ tulyam ity ācikhyāsu me manaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:276: sa guṇo vāstu doṣo vety ācikhyāsopamāṃ viduḥ // DKd_2.32 //
GK16dkavy12u:279: na jātu śaktir indos te mukhena pratigarjitum &
GK16dkavy12u:282: tathāpi sama evāsau notkarṣīti caṭūpamā // DKd_2.35 //
GK16dkavy12u:283: na padmaṃ mukham evedaṃ na bhṛṅgau cakṣuṣī ime &
GK16dkavy12u:288: tvadānanaṃ vibhātīti tām abhūtopamāṃ viduḥ // DKd_2.38 //
GK16dkavy12u:289: candrabimbād iva viṣaṃ candanād iva pāvakaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:290: paruṣā vāg ito vaktrād ity asaṃbhāvitopamā // DKd_2.39 //
GK16dkavy12u:292: sparśas tavety atiśayaṃ bodhayanti bahūpamā // DKd_2.40 //
GK16dkavy12u:294: tava tanvaṅgi vadanam ity asau vikriyopamā // DKd_2.41 //
GK16dkavy12u:296: vikramas tvayy adhāl lakṣmīm iti mālopamā matā // DKd_2.42 //
GK16dkavy12u:301: nalinyā iva tanvaṅgyās tasyāḥ padmam ivānanam &
GK16dkavy12u:302: mayā madhuvrateneva pāyaṃ pāyam aramyata // DKd_2.45 //
GK16dkavy12u:306: nanu dvitīyo nāsty eva pārijātasya pādapaḥ // DKd_2.47 //
GK16dkavy12u:308: yad bruvanti smṛtā seyaṃ tulyayogopamā yathā // DKd_2.48 //
GK16dkavy12u:309: divo jagarti rakṣāyai pulomārir bhuvo bhavān &
GK16dkavy12u:310: asurās tena hanyante sāvalepās tvayā nṛpāḥ // DKd_2.49 //
GK16dkavy12u:311: kāntyā candramasaṃ dhāmnā sūryaṃ dhairyeṇa cārṇavam &
GK16dkavy12u:312: rājann anukaroṣīti saiṣā hetūpamā matā // DKd_2.50 //
GK16dkavy12u:313: na liṅgavacane bhinne na hīnādhikatāpi vā &
GK16dkavy12u:315: strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍho 'yaṃ vakty eṣā strī pumān iva &
GK16dkavy12u:316: prāṇā iva priyo 'yaṃ me vidyā dhanam ivārjitā // DKd_2.52 //
GK16dkavy12u:318: alam aṃśumataḥ kakṣām āroḍhuṃ tejasā nṛpah // DKd_2.53 //
GK16dkavy12u:319: ityevamādau saubhāgyaṃ na jahāty eva jātu cit &
GK16dkavy12u:320: asty eva kva cid udvegaḥ prayoge vāgvidāṃ yathā // DKd_2.54 //
GK16dkavy12u:322: bhartṛbhakto bhaṭaḥ śveva khadyoto bhāti bhānuvat // DKd_2.55 //
GK16dkavy12u:323: īdṛśaṃ varjyate sadbhiḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra cintyatāṃ &
GK16dkavy12u:334: spardhate jayati dveṣṭi druhyati pratigarjati // DKd_2.61 //
GK16dkavy12u:337: tasya muṣṇāti saubhāgyaṃ tasya kāntiṃ vilumpati &
GK16dkavy12u:338: tena sārdhaṃ vigṛhṇāti tulāṃ tenādhirohati // DKd_2.63 //
GK16dkavy12u:339: tatpadavyāṃ padaṃ dhatte tasya kakṣāṃ vigāhate &
GK16dkavy12u:340: tam anvety anubadhnāti tacchīlaṃ tan niṣedhati // DKd_2.64 //
GK16dkavy12u:347: bāhū late vasantaśrīs tvaṃ naḥ pratyakṣacāriṇī // DKd_2.67 //
GK16dkavy12u:363: mukhena mugdhaḥ so 'py eṣa jano rāgamayaḥ krtaḥ // DKd_2.75 //
GK16dkavy12u:365: aṅgāni rūpayanty atra yogāyogau bhidākarau // DKd_2.76 //
GK16dkavy12u:369: iti jyotsnotpalāyogād ayuktaṃ nāma rūpakam // DKd_2.78 //
GK16dkavy12u:371: rūpakaṃ viṣamaṃ nāma lalitaṃ jāyate yathā // DKd_2.79 //
GK16dkavy12u:378: na mīlayati padmāni na nabho 'py avagāhate &
GK16dkavy12u:381: atra saṃdarśyate yasmād viruddhaṃ nāma rūpakam // DKd_2.84 //
GK16dkavy12u:383: kāmadatvāc ca lokānām asi tvaṃ kalpapādapaḥ // DKd_2.85 //
GK16dkavy12u:385: kalpadrumaś ca kriyate tad idaṃ heturūpakam // DKd_2.86 //
GK16dkavy12u:387: sakhi vaktrāmbujam idaṃ taveti śliṣṭarūpakam // DKd_2.87 //
GK16dkavy12u:395: na te sundari saṃvādīty etad ākṣeparūpakam // DKd_2.91 //
GK16dkavy12u:396: mukhendur api te caṇḍi māṃ nirdahati nirdayam &
GK16dkavy12u:400: naitan mukham idaṃ padmaṃ ta netre bhramarāv imau &
GK16dkavy12u:401: etāni kesarāṇy eva naitā dantārciṣas tava // DKd_2.94 //
GK16dkavy12u:408: sarvavākyopakāraś cet tam āhur dīpakaṃ yathā // DKd_2.97 //
GK16dkavy12u:409: pavano dakṣiṇaḥ pārṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ harati vīrudhām &
GK16dkavy12u:412: cakravālādrikuñjeṣu kundabhāso guṇāś ca te // DKd_2.99 //
GK16dkavy12u:416: kvāpi nītāḥ kuto 'py āsann ānītā devetarddhayaḥ // DKd_2.101 //
GK16dkavy12u:418: vākyayor darśayiṣyāmaḥ kāni cit tāni tad yathā // DKd_2.102 //
GK16dkavy12u:420: badhnanti ca payodeṣu dṛśo harṣāśrugarbhiṇīḥ // DKd_2.103 //
GK16dkavy12u:421: mando gandhavahaḥ kṣāro vahnir induś ca jāyate &
GK16dkavy12u:424: calaṃ ca taḍitāṃ dāma balaṃ kusumadhanvanaḥ // DKd_2.105 //
GK16dkavy12u:426: mayāpi maraṇe cetas trayam etat samaṃ kṛtam // DKd_2.106 //
GK16dkavy12u:427: śuklaḥ śvetārciṣo vṛddhyai pakṣaḥ pañcaśarasya saḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:428: sa ca rāgasya rāgo 'pi yūnāṃ ratyutsavaśriyaḥ // DKd_2.107 //
GK16dkavy12u:430: vākyamālā prayukteti tan mālādīpakaṃ matam // DKd_2.108 //
GK16dkavy12u:435: haraty ābhogam āśānāṃ gṛhṇāti jyotiṣāṃ gaṇam &
GK16dkavy12u:436: ādatte cādya me prāṇān asau jaladharāvalī // DKd_2.111 //
GK16dkavy12u:440: divi bhramanti jīmūtā bhuvi caite mataṅgajāḥ // DKd_2.113 //
GK16dkavy12u:441: atra dharmair abhinnānām abhrāṇāṃ dantināṃ tathā &
GK16dkavy12u:449: unmīlanti ca kandalyo dalanti kakubhāni ca // DKd_2.117 //
GK16dkavy12u:451: yūnāṃ cotkaṇṭhayaty eṣa mānasaṃ makaradhvajaḥ // DKd_2.118 //
GK16dkavy12u:452: jitvā viśvaṃ bhavān atra viharaty avarodhanaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:453: viharatv apsarobhis te ripuvargo divaṃ gataḥ //
GK16dkavy12u:460: pravṛttaiva yad ākṣiptā vṛttākṣepaḥ sa īdṛśaḥ // DKd_2.122 //
GK16dkavy12u:462: kim apāṅgam aparyāptam asmin karmaṇi manyase // DKd_2.123 //
GK16dkavy12u:464: karṇe kā cit priyeṇaivaṃ cāṭukāreṇa rudhyate // DKd_2.124 //
GK16dkavy12u:465: satyaṃ bravīmi na tvaṃ māṃ draṣṭuṃ vallabha lapsyase &
GK16dkavy12u:468: kadācid aparādho 'sya bhāvīty evam arunddha yat // DKd_2.126 //
GK16dkavy12u:469: tava tanvaṅgi mithyaiva rūḍham aṅgeṣu mārdavam &
GK16dkavy12u:470: yadi satyaṃ mṛdūny eva kim akāṇḍe rujanti mām // DKd_2.127 //
GK16dkavy12u:472: kāmukena yad atraivaṃ karmaṇā tadvirodhinā // DKd_2.128 //
GK16dkavy12u:473: sundarī sā na vety eṣa vivekaḥ kena jāyate &
GK16dkavy12u:474: prabhāmātraṃ hi taralaṃ dṛśyate na tadāśrayaḥ // DKd_2.129 //
GK16dkavy12u:478: bhruvau ca bhugne na tathāpy aduṣṭasyāsti me bhayam // DKd_2.131 //
GK16dkavy12u:479: sa eṣa kāraṇākṣepaḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhiyaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:480: svāparādho niṣiddho 'tra yat priyeṇa paṭīyasā // DKd_2.132 //
GK16dkavy12u:482: dṛṣṭaś ca phullā niculā na mṛtā cāsmi kiṃ nv idam // DKd_2.133 //
GK16dkavy12u:485: na ciraṃ mama tāpāya tava yātrā bhaviṣyati &
GK16dkavy12u:486: yadi yāsyasi yātavyam alam āśaṅkayātra te // DKd_2.135 //
GK16dkavy12u:489: dhanaṃ ca bahu labhyaṃ te sukhaṃ kṣemaṃ ca vartmani &
GK16dkavy12u:490: na ca me prāṇasaṃdehas tathāpi priya mā sma gāḥ // DKd_2.137 //
GK16dkavy12u:492: prabhutvenaiva ruddhas tat prabhutvākṣepa ucyate // DKd_2.138 //
GK16dkavy12u:494: gaccha tiṣṭha vā kānta svāvasthā tu niveditā // DKd_2.139 //
GK16dkavy12u:496: priyaprayāṇaṃ rundhatyā prayuktam iha raktayā // DKd_2.140 //
GK16dkavy12u:497: gaccha gacchasi cet kānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:498: mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyād yatra gato bhavān // DKd_2.141 //
GK16dkavy12u:501: yadi satyaiva yātrā te kāpy anyā mṛgyatāṃ tvayā &
GK16dkavy12u:502: aham adyaiva ruddhāsmi randhrāpekṣeṇa mṛtyunā // DKd_2.143 //
GK16dkavy12u:505: gantā ced gaccha tūrṇaṃ te karṇau yānti purā ravāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:510: nirgacchati mukhād vāṇī mā gā iti karomi kim // DKd_2.147 //
GK16dkavy12u:514: premṇaḥ prayāṇaṃ tvaṃ brūhi mayā tasyeṣṭam iṣyate // DKd_2.149 //
GK16dkavy12u:517: sahiṣye virahaṃ nātha dehy adṛśyāñjanaṃ mama &
GK16dkavy12u:518: yad aktanetrāṃ kandarpaḥ prahartā māṃ na paśyati // DKd_2.151 //
GK16dkavy12u:520: patyuḥ prasthānam ity āhur upāyākṣepam īdṛśam // DKd_2.152 //
GK16dkavy12u:521: pravṛttaiva prayāmīti vāṇī vallabha te mukhāt &
GK16dkavy12u:522: ayatāpi tvayedānīṃ mandapremṇā mamāsti kim // DKd_2.153 //
GK16dkavy12u:524: saṃrabdhayā priyārabdhaṃ prayāṇaṃ yan niṣidhyate // DKd_2.154 //
GK16dkavy12u:526: buddhvā vakti priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ cireṇāgato bhavān // DKd_2.155 //
GK16dkavy12u:528: kāntasya kātarākṣyā yan mūrchākṣepa sa īdṛśaḥ // DKd_2.156 //
GK16dkavy12u:529: nāghrātaṃ na kṛtaṃ karṇe strībhir madhuni nārpitam &
GK16dkavy12u:530: tvaddviṣāṃ dīrghikāsyeva viśīrṇaṃ nīlam utpalam // DKd_2.157 //
GK16dkavy12u:534: mukhendau tava satyasminn apareṇa kim indunā // DKd_2.159 //
GK16dkavy12u:537: artho na saṃbhṛtaḥ kaś cin na vidyā kā cid arcitā &
GK16dkavy12u:538: na tapaḥ saṃcintaṃ kiṃ cid gataṃ ca sakalaṃ vayaḥ // DKd_2.161 //
GK16dkavy12u:541: kim ayaṃ śaradambhodaḥ kiṃ vā haṃsakadambakam &
GK16dkavy12u:542: rutaṃ nūpurasaṃvādi śrūyate tan na toyadaḥ // DKd_2.163 //
GK16dkavy12u:543: ity ayaṃ saṃśayākṣepaḥ saṃśayo yan nivartyate &
GK16dkavy12u:545: citram ākrāntaviśvo 'pi vikramas te na tṛpyati &
GK16dkavy12u:546: kadā vā dṛśyate tṛptir udīrṇasya havir bhujaḥ // DKd_2.165 //
GK16dkavy12u:549: na stūyase narendra tvaṃ dadāsīti kadā cana &
GK16dkavy12u:550: svam eva matvā gṛhṇanti yatas tvad dhanam arthinaḥ // DKd_2.167 //
GK16dkavy12u:554: jñeyah so 'rthāntaranyāso vastu prastutya kiṃ cana &
GK16dkavy12u:561: paśya gacchata evāstaṃ niyatiḥ kena laṅghyate // DKd_2.172 //
GK16dkavy12u:565: nanu dākṣiṇyasaṃpannaḥ sarvasya bhavati priyaḥ // DKd_2.174 //
GK16dkavy12u:567: anugṛhṇāti hi parān sadoṣo 'pi dvijeśvaraḥ // DKd_2.175 //
GK16dkavy12u:569: kaṭur bhavati karṇasya kāmināṃ pāpam īdṛśam // DKd_2.176 //
GK16dkavy12u:572: kṣiṇotu kāmaṃ śītāṃśuḥ kiṃ vasanto dunoti mām &
GK16dkavy12u:573: malinācaritaṃ karma surabher nanv asāṃpratam // DKd_2.178 //
GK16dkavy12u:574: kumudāny api dāhāya kim ayaṃ kamalākaraḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:577: śabdopātte prātīte vā sādṛśye vastunor dvayoḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:578: tatra yad bhedakathanaṃ vyatirekaḥ sa kathyate // DKd_2.180 //
GK16dkavy12u:580: guṇais tulyo 'si bhedas tu vapuṣaivedṛśena te // DKd_2.181 //
GK16dkavy12u:584: asāv añjanasaṃkāśas tvaṃ tu cāmīkaradyutiḥ // DKd_2.183 //
GK16dkavy12u:586: kārṣṇyaṃ piśaṅgatā cobhau yat pṛthag darśitāv iha // DKd_2.184 //
GK16dkavy12u:587: tvaṃ samudraś ca durvārau mahāsattvau satejasau &
GK16dkavy12u:588: ayaṃ tu yuvayor bhedaḥ sa jaḍātmā paṭur bhavān // DKd_2.185 //
GK16dkavy12u:589: sa eṣa śleṣarūpatvāt saśleṣa iti gṛhyatām &
GK16dkavy12u:590: sākṣepaś ca sahetuś ca darśyate tad api dvayam // DKd_2.186 //
GK16dkavy12u:591: sthitimān api dhīro 'pi ratnānām ākaro 'pi san &
GK16dkavy12u:592: tava kakṣāṃ na yāty eva malino makarālayaḥ // DKd_2.187 //
GK16dkavy12u:594: bhartṛbhāvād bhujaṅgānāṃ śeṣas tvatto nikṛṣyate // DKd_2.188 //
GK16dkavy12u:597: tvanmukhaṃ kamalaṃ ceti dvayor apy anayor bhidā &
GK16dkavy12u:600: idaṃ tu nayanadvandvaṃ tava taguṇabhūṣitam // DKd_2.191 //
GK16dkavy12u:602: sadṛśavyatirekaś ca punar anyaḥ pradarśyate // DKd_2.192 //
GK16dkavy12u:604: bhramadbhramaram ambhojaṃ lolanetraṃ mukhaṃ tu te // DKd_2.193 //
GK16dkavy12u:608: kṛtaḥ pratītaśuddhyoś ca bhedo 'smiṃś candrahaṃsayoḥ // DKd_2.195 //
GK16dkavy12u:614: dṛṣṭirodhitayā tulyaṃ bhinnam anyair adarśi tat //
GK16dkavy12u:617: yatra svābhāvikatvaṃ vā vibhāvyaṃ sā vibhāvanā // DKd_2.199 //
GK16dkavy12u:621: arañjito 'ruṇaś cāyam adharas tava sundari // DKd_2.201 //
GK16dkavy12u:623: ahetukaṃ ca tasyeha vivakṣety aviruddhatā // DKd_2.202 //
GK16dkavy12u:627: uktaṃ ca surabhitvādi phalaṃ tat sā vibhāvanā //
GK16dkavy12u:630: uktiḥ saṃkṣeparūpatvāt sā samāsoktir iṣyate // DKd_2.205 //
GK16dkavy12u:632: apy asaṃnaddhasaurabhyaṃ paśya cumbati kuḍmalam // DKd_2.206 //
GK16dkavy12u:634: kasyāṃ cid iha bālāyām icchāvṛttir vibhāvyate // DKd_2.207 //
GK16dkavy12u:636: asty asāv aparāpy asti bhinnābhinnaviśeṣaṇā // DKd_2.208 //
GK16dkavy12u:638: sāndracchāyo mahāvṛkṣaḥ so 'yam āsādito mayā // DKd_2.209 //
GK16dkavy12u:640: socchrayaḥ sthairyavān daivād eṣa labdho mayā drumaḥ // DKd_2.210 //
GK16dkavy12u:642: sarve sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ pūrvatrānyatra tu dvayam // DKd_2.211 //
GK16dkavy12u:644: ayam ambhonidhiḥ kaṣṭaṃ kālena pariśuṣyati // DKd_2.212 //
GK16dkavy12u:649: asāv atiśayoktiḥ syād alaṃkārottamā yathā // DKd_2.214 //
GK16dkavy12u:652: kṣaumavatyo na lakṣyante jyotsnāyām abhisārikāḥ // DKd_2.215 //
GK16dkavy12u:654: saṃśayātiśayādīnāṃ vyaktyai kiṃ cin nidarśyate // DKd_2.216 //
GK16dkavy12u:655: stanayor jaghanasyāpi madhye madhyaṃ priye tava &
GK16dkavy12u:656: asti nāstīti saṃdeho na me 'dyāpi nivartate // DKd_2.217 //
GK16dkavy12u:657: nirṇetuṃ śakyam astīti madhyaṃ tava nitambini &
GK16dkavy12u:660: māti mātum aśakyo 'pi yaśorāśir yad atra te // DKd_2.219 //
GK16dkavy12u:665: anyathotprekṣyate yatra tām utprekṣāṃ vidur yathā // DKd_2.221 //
GK16dkavy12u:667: manye mārtaṇḍagṛhyāṇi padmāny uddhartum udyataḥ // DKd_2.222 //
GK16dkavy12u:668: snātuṃ pātuṃ bisāny attuṃ kariṇo jalagāhanam &
GK16dkavy12u:671: iti karṇotpalaṃ prāyas tava dṛṣṭyā vilaṅghyate // DKd_2.224 //
GK16dkavy12u:673: spṛśyate vā na vety evaṃ kavinotprekṣya varṇyate // DKd_2.225 //
GK16dkavy12u:679: limpates tamasaś cāsau dharmaḥ ko 'tra samīkṣyate // DKd_2.228 //
GK16dkavy12u:680: yadi lepanam eveṣṭaṃ limpatir nāma ko 'paraḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:681: sa eva dharmo dharmī cety anunmatto na bhāṣate // DKd_2.229 //
GK16dkavy12u:682: kartā yady upamānaṃ syān nyagbhūto 'sau kriyāpade &
GK16dkavy12u:684: yo limpaty amunā tulyaṃ tama ity api śaṃsataḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:685: aṅgānīti na saṃbaddhaṃ so 'pi mṛgyaḥ samo guṇaḥ // DKd_2.231 //
GK16dkavy12u:686: yathendur iva te vaktram iti kāntiḥ pratīyate &
GK16dkavy12u:687: na tathā limpater lepād anyad atra pratīyate // DKd_2.232 //
GK16dkavy12u:689: aṅgakarmā ca puṃsaivam utprekṣyata itīṣyatām // DKd_2.233 //
GK16dkavy12u:690: manye śaṅke dhruvaṃ prāyo nūnam ityevamādibhiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:693: hetuś ca sūkṣmaleśau ca vācām uttamabhūṣaṇam &
GK16dkavy12u:694: kārakajñāpakau hetū tau cānekavidhau yathā // DKd_2.235 //
GK16dkavy12u:698: alaṃkāratayoddiṣṭaṃ nivṛttāv api tat samam // DKd_2.237 //
GK16dkavy12u:703: nivartye ca vikārye ca hetutvaṃ tadapekṣayā &
GK16dkavy12u:704: prāpye tu karmaṇi prāyaḥ kriyāpekṣaiva hetutā // DKd_2.240 //
GK16dkavy12u:708: candraḥ pūrṇaś ca kāmena pānthadṛṣṭer viṣaṃ kṛtam // DKd_2.242 //
GK16dkavy12u:711: gato 'stam arko bhātīndur yānti vāsāya pakṣiṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:712: itīdam api sādhv eva kālāvasthānivedane // DKd_2.244 //
GK16dkavy12u:714: dehoṣmabhiḥ subodhaṃ te sakhi kāmāturaṃ manaḥ // DKd_2.245 //
GK16dkavy12u:716: abhāvahetavaḥ ke cid vyāhriyante manoharāḥ // DKd_2.246 //
GK16dkavy12u:720: kṣato mohaś cyutā tṛṣṇā kṛtaṃ puṇyāśrame manaḥ // DKd_2.248 //
GK16dkavy12u:721: vanāny amūni na gṛhāṇy etā nadyo na yoṣitaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:722: mṛgā ime na dāyādās tan me nandati mānasam // DKd_2.249 //
GK16dkavy12u:724: atas teṣāṃ vivardhante satataṃ sarvasaṃpadaḥ // DKd_2.250 //
GK16dkavy12u:734: muktaṃ tad anyatas tena so 'py ahaṃ manasi kṣataḥ // DKd_2.255 //
GK16dkavy12u:738: prāg eva hariṇākṣīṇām udīrṇo rāgasāgaraḥ // DKd_2.257 //
GK16dkavy12u:745: iṅgitākāralakṣyo 'rthaḥ saukṣmyāt sūkṣma iti smṛtaḥ // DKd_2.260 //
GK16dkavy12u:746: kadā nau saṃgamo bhāvīty ākīrṇe vaktum akṣamam &
GK16dkavy12u:747: avetya kāntam abalā līlāpadmaṃ nyamīlayat // DKd_2.261 //
GK16dkavy12u:758: avagaccheyur ā jñātam aho śītānilaṃ vanam // DKd_2.266 //
GK16dkavy12u:759: ānandāśru pravṛttaṃ me kathaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakām &
GK16dkavy12u:760: akṣi me puṣparajasā vātoddhūtena dūṣitam // DKd_2.267 //
GK16dkavy12u:762: leśam eke vidur nindāṃ stutiṃ vā leśataḥ kṛtām // DKd_2.268 //
GK16dkavy12u:763: yuvaiṣa guṇavān rājā yogyas te patir ūrjitaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:764: raṇotsave manaḥ saktaṃ yasya kāmotsavād api // DKd_2.269 //
GK16dkavy12u:766: kanyāyāḥ kalpate bhogān nirvivikṣor nirantaram // DKd_2.270 //
GK16dkavy12u:767: capalo nirdayaś cāsau janaḥ kiṃ tena me sakhi &
GK16dkavy12u:773: yathāsaṃkhyam iti proktaṃ saṃkhyānaṃ krama ity api // DKd_2.273 //
GK16dkavy12u:778: ūrjasvi rūḍhāhaṃkāraṃ yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tat trayam // DKd_2.275 //
GK16dkavy12u:779: adya yā mama govinda jātā tvayi gṛhāgate &
GK16dkavy12u:780: kālenaiṣā bhavet prītis tavaivāgamanāt punaḥ // DKd_2.276 //
GK16dkavy12u:781: ity āha yuktaṃ viduro nānyatas tādṛśī dhṛtiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:782: bhaktimātrasamārādhyaḥ suprītaś ca tato hariḥ // DKd_2.277 //
GK16dkavy12u:783: somaḥ sūryo marudbhūmir vyoma hotānalo jalam &
GK16dkavy12u:784: iti rūpāṇy atikramya tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ deva ke vayam // DKd_2.278 //
GK16dkavy12u:785: iti sākṣātkṛte deve rājño yad rātavarmaṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:786: prītiprakāśanaṃ tac ca preya ity avagamyatām // DKd_2.279 //
GK16dkavy12u:787: mṛte 'ti pretya saṃgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ matam &
GK16dkavy12u:788: saivāvantī mayā labdhā katham atraiva janmani // DKd_2.280 //
GK16dkavy12u:789: prāk prītir darśitā seyaṃ ratiḥ śṛṅgāratāṃ gatā &
GK16dkavy12u:791: nigṛhya keśeṣv ākṛṣṭā kṛṣṇā yenāgrato mama &
GK16dkavy12u:792: so 'yaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ pāpo labdhaḥ kiṃ jīvati kṣaṇam // DKd_2.282 //
GK16dkavy12u:793: ity āruhya parāṃ koṭiṃ krodho raudrātmatāṃ gataḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:794: bhīmasya paśyataḥ śatrum ity etad rasavadvacaḥ // DKd_2.283 //
GK16dkavy12u:795: ajitvā sārṇavām urvīm aniṣṭvā vividhair makhaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:796: adatvā cārtham arthibhyo bhaveyaḥ pārthivaḥ katham // DKd_2.284 //
GK16dkavy12u:798: rasavattvaṃ girām āsāṃ samarthayitum īśvaraḥ // DKd_2.285 //
GK16dkavy12u:800: sādhiśete kathaṃ tanvī hutāśanavatīṃ citām // DKd_2.286 //
GK16dkavy12u:804: kauṇapāḥ saha nṛtyanti kabandhair antrabhūṣaṇāḥ // DKd_2.288 //
GK16dkavy12u:806: chādyatām uttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi // DKd_2.289 //
GK16dkavy12u:808: śākhāś ca mandirāṇy eṣāṃ citraṃ nandanaśākhinām // DKd_2.290 //
GK16dkavy12u:812: iha tv aṣṭarasāyattā rasavattā smṛtā girām //
GK16dkavy12u:814: apakartāham asmīti hṛdi te mā sma bhūd bhayam &
GK16dkavy12u:815: vimukheṣu na me khaḍgaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati // DKd_2.293 //
GK16dkavy12u:816: iti muktaḥ paro yuddhe niruddho darpaśalinā &
GK16dkavy12u:819: artham iṣṭam anākhyāya sākṣāt tasyaiva siddhaye &
GK16dkavy12u:820: yat prakārāntarākhyānaṃ paryāyoktaṃ tad iṣyate // DKd_2.295 //
GK16dkavy12u:822: tam ahaṃ vārayiṣyāmi yuvābhyāṃ svairam āsyatām // DKd_2.296 //
GK16dkavy12u:827: tatsādhanasamāpattir yā tad āhuḥ samāhitam // DKd_2.298 //
GK16dkavy12u:828: mānam asyā nirākartuṃ pādayor me patiṣyataḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:831: āśayasya vibhūter vā yan mahatvam anuttamam &
GK16dkavy12u:832: udāttaṃ nāma taṃ prāhur alaṃkāraṃ manīṣibhiḥ // DKd_2.300 //
GK16dkavy12u:833: guroḥ śasanam atyetuṃ na śaśāka sa rāghavaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:836: jñāto laṅkeśvaraḥ kṛcchrād āñjaneyena tattvataḥ // DKd_2.302 //
GK16dkavy12u:838: suvyañjitam iti proktaṃ udāttadvayam apy adaḥ //
GK16dkavy12u:841: na pañceṣu smaras tasya sahasraṃ patriṇām iti // DKd_2.304 //
GK16dkavy12u:842: candanaṃ candrikā mando gandhavāhaś ca dakṣiṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:843: seyam agnimayī sṛṣṭir mayi śītā parān prati // DKd_2.305 //
GK16dkavy12u:849: uktā smarārtenety eṣā svarūpāpahnutir matā // DKd_2.308 //
GK16dkavy12u:854: tad abhinnapadaṃ bhinnapadaprāyam iti dvidhā // DKd_2.310 //
GK16dkavy12u:856: rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ // DKd_2.311 //
GK16dkavy12u:858: rājñā pradoṣo mām ittham apriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate // DKd_2.312 //
GK16dkavy12u:860: prāg eva darśitāḥ śleṣā darśyante ke canāpare // DKd_2.313 //
GK16dkavy12u:862: viruddhakarmā cāsty anyaḥ śleṣo niyamavān api // DKd_2.314 //
GK16dkavy12u:864: teṣāṃ nidarśaneṣv eva rūpam āvirbhaviṣyati // DKd_2.315 //
GK16dkavy12u:866: dṛśo dūtyaś ca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyān // DKd_2.316 //
GK16dkavy12u:870: tirobhavati dharmāṃśur aṅgajas tu vijṛṃbhate // DKd_2.318 //
GK16dkavy12u:871: nistriṃśatvam asāv eva dhanuṣy evāsya vakratā &
GK16dkavy12u:872: śareṣv eva narendrasya mārgaṇatvaṃ ca vartate // DKd_2.319 //
GK16dkavy12u:873: padmānām eva daṇḍeṣu kaṇṭakas tvayi rakṣati &
GK16dkavy12u:876: dakṣaḥ prajāpatiś cāsīt svāmī śaktidharaś ca saḥ // DKd_2.321 //
GK16dkavy12u:882: na kaṭhoraṃ na vā tīkṣṇam āyudhaṃ puṣpadhanvanaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:883: tathāpi jitam evāsīd amunā bhuvanatrayam // DKd_2.324 //
GK16dkavy12u:885: tathāpy eṣā tapobhaṅgaṃ vidhātuṃ vedhaso 'py alam // DKd_2.325 //
GK16dkavy12u:886: na baddhā bhrūkuṭir nāpi sphurito daśanacchadaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:887: na ca raktābhavad dṛṣṭir jitaṃ ca dviṣatāṃ kulam // DKd_2.326 //
GK16dkavy12u:888: na rathā na ca mātaṅgā na hayā na ca pattayaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:889: strīṇām apāṅgadṛṣṭyaiva jīyate jagatāṃ trayam // DKd_2.327 //
GK16dkavy12u:890: ekacakro ratho yantā vikalo viṣamā hayāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:891: ākrāmaty eva tejasvī tathāpy arko nabhastalam // DKd_2.328 //
GK16dkavy12u:893: ayam eva kramo 'nyeṣāṃ bhedānām api kalpane//
GK16dkavy12u:896: kīrtanaṃ stutinindārthaṃ sā matā tulyayogitā // DKd_2.330 //
GK16dkavy12u:897: yamaḥ kubero varuṇaḥ sahasrākṣo bhavān api &
GK16dkavy12u:898: bibhranty ananyaviṣayāṃ lokapāla iti śrutim // DKd_2.331 //
GK16dkavy12u:900: kṣaṇadvayaṃ na tiṣṭhanti ghanārabdhāny api svayam //
GK16dkavy12u:903: viśeṣadarśanāyaiva sa virodhaḥ smṛto yathā // DKd_2.333 //
GK16dkavy12u:905: kṣīyate ca mayūrāṇāṃ rutam utkrāntasauṣṭhavam // DKd_2.334 //
GK16dkavy12u:907: rāgeṇa punar ākrāntaṃ jāyate jagatāṃ manaḥ // DKd_2.335 //
GK16dkavy12u:909: natanābhi vapuḥ strīṇāṃ kaṃ na haraty unnatastanam // DKd_2.336 //
GK16dkavy12u:911: api te rūpam asmākaṃ tanvi tāpāya kalpate // DKd_2.337 //
GK16dkavy12u:915: yāti viśvasanīyatvaṃ kasya te kalabhāṣini // DKd_2.339 //
GK16dkavy12u:918: aprastutapraśaṃsā syād aprakrānteṣu yā stutiḥ // DKd_2.340 //
GK16dkavy12u:924: yadi nindann iva stauti vyājastutir asau smrtā &
GK16dkavy12u:925: doṣābhāsā guṇā eva labhante hy atra saṃnidhim // DKd_2.343 //
GK16dkavy12u:927: tvayā rājñāpi saiveyaṃ jitā mā bhūn madas tava // DKd_2.344 //
GK16dkavy12u:928: puṃsaḥ purāṇād ācchidya śrīs tvayā paribhujyate &
GK16dkavy12u:929: rājann ikṣākuvaṃśasya kim idaṃ tava yujyate // DKd_2.345 //
GK16dkavy12u:931: ahaṅkāraḥ parāṃ koṭim ārohati kutas tava // DKd_2.346 //
GK16dkavy12u:936: sad asad vā nidarśyeta yadi tat syān nidarśanam // DKd_2.348 //
GK16dkavy12u:937: udayann eṣa savitā padmeṣv arpayati śriyam &
GK16dkavy12u:943: arthānāṃ yo vinimayaḥ parivṛttis tu sā smṛtā // DKd_2.351 //
GK16dkavy12u:944: saha dīrghā mama śvāsair imāḥ samprati rātrayaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:945: pāṇḍurāś ca mamaivāṅgeḥ saha tāś candrabhūṣaṇāh // DKd_2.352 //
GK16dkavy12u:947: patanti ca samaṃ teṣām asubhir malayānilāḥ // DKd_2.353 //
GK16dkavy12u:949: yānti sārdhaṃ janānandair vṛddhiṃ surabhivāsarāḥ // DKd_2.354 //
GK16dkavy12u:950: ity udāhṛtayo dattāḥ sahokter atra kāś cana //
GK16dkavy12u:952: kriyate parivṛtteś ca kiṃ cid rūpanidarśanam // DKd_2.355 //
GK16dkavy12u:960: upamārūpakaṃ cāpi rūpakeṣv eva darśitam // DKd_2.358 //
GK16dkavy12u:964: ity alaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭer lakṣaṇīyā dvayī gatiḥ // DKd_2.360 //
GK16dkavy12u:966: kośadaṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kim eṣām asti duṣkaram // DKd_2.361 //
GK16dkavy12u:969: śleṣaḥ sarvāsu puṣṇāti prāyo vakroktiṣu śriyam &
GK16dkavy12u:970: bhinnaṃ dvidhā svabhāvoktir vakroktiś ceti vāṅmayam //
GK16dkavy12u:972: tad bhāvikam iti prāhuḥ prabandhaviṣayaṃ guṇam &
GK16dkavy12u:973: bhāvaḥ kaver abhiprāyaḥ kāvyeṣv āsiddhi saṃsthitaḥ // DKd_2.364 //
GK16dkavy12u:977: bhāvāyattām idaṃ sarvam iti tad bhāvikaṃ viduḥ //
GK16dkavy12u:980: vyāvarṇitam idaṃ ceṣṭam alaṅkāratayāiva naḥ // DKd_2.367 //
GK16dkavy12u:981: panthāḥ sa eṣa vivṛtaḥ parimāṇavṛttyā saṃhṛtya vistaram anantam alaṅkriyāṇām &
GK16dkavy12u:982: vācām atītya viṣayaṃ parivartamānān abhyāsa eva vivarītum alaṃ viśeṣān // DKd_2.368 //
GK16dkavy12u:983: ity ācāryadaṇḍinaḥ kṛtau kāvyādarśe 'rthālaṅkāravibhāgo nāma dvitīyo paricchedaḥ //
